a.title: Permalink to Student Thespians Recognized in Week Four of “Art Connects”, Riverside County Office of Education’s Virtual Arts Competition

h2.a: Student Thespians Recognized in Week Four of “Art Connects”, Riverside County Office of Education’s Virtual Arts Competition

div.p: Winning entries in the category of theater arts incorporated the theme “Expressions of Persistence”. Media arts competition submissions close today, with music submissions now being accepted through May 5 for the final week of competition.

article.class: post-40167 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-feature

a.title: Permalink to Riverside County Office of Education Celebrates National Teacher Appreciation Day

h2.a: Riverside County Office of Education Celebrates National Teacher Appreciation Day

div.p: Congratulations Brenda Barreras, one of our 2020 Riverside County Teachers of the Year and a California Teacher of the Year. Watch Brenda’s video now!

article.class: post-40283 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-feature

a.title: Permalink to Student Dancers Recognized in Week Three of “Art Connects” Virtual Student Arts Competition

h2.a: Student Dancers Recognized in Week Three of “Art Connects” Virtual Student Arts Competition

div.p: RIVERSIDE – Couches, chairs, coffee tables, and cars were on the move last week at many homes across Riverside County as family rooms, dining rooms, backyards, garages, driveways, and bedrooms were temporarily converted… Read More »

article.class: post-40243 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-feature

a.title: Permalink to Nearly 500 More Entries Submitted for Week Two of “Art Connects” Virtual Student Arts Competition

h2.a: Nearly 500 More Entries Submitted for Week Two of “Art Connects” Virtual Student Arts Competition

div.p: Winning entries in the category of visual arts incorporated the theme “Expressions of Possibility”. Dance competition submissions close today, with Theater submissions now being accepted through April 21. RIVERSIDE – Pencil sketches, colorful… Read More »
